hypothesis_content.title: BTC 4-Hour Bollinger Band Squeeze Breakout with Volume Confirmation
hypothesis_content.statement: When BTC enters a volatility compression phase (Bollinger Band Width on 4H chart < 0.03) during a NEUTRAL regime, a breakout above the upper band with volume > 1.5x 20-period average will lead to a directional move of at least 2.5% in the breakout direction within the next 12 hours.
hypothesis_content.rationale: Volatility compression during neutral periods represents energy storage. A high-volume breakout from this compression signals institutional participation and directional conviction, often leading to short-term momentum continuation.
entry_conditions: BTC 4H Bollinger Band Width (20,2) < 0.03 for at least 4 consecutive periods
Price closes above upper Bollinger Band
Volume on breakout candle > 1.5x 20-period average volume
RSI(14) on 4H < 70 (to avoid overbought false breakout)

exit_conditions.stop_loss: 1.0% below entry price OR close back inside Bollinger Bands
exit_conditions.time_exit: 12 hours after entry if TP/SL not hit

hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: More than 55% of such signals result in immediate reversal (close back inside bands within 2 candles) or fail to reach 2.5% target within 12 hours.
